datenschutz.title: Data protection
datenschutz.firstParagraph: MIQ stands for 'Reporting and Information Center for Queerphobia' and is a project that aims to highlight queerphobia in North Rhine-Westphalia (NRW).
datenschutz.secondParagraph: You can report a queerphobic incident on our website. We also serve as an information center and can guide you to additional counseling services in NRW.

heroSection.title: We are MIQ and will be happy to help you!

description.firstParagraph: MIQ stands for 'Reporting and Information Center for Queer Hostility' and is a project that aims to highlight queer hostility in NRW.
description.secondParagraph: You can report a queer-hostile incident on our website. We also serve as an information resource and guide you to further counseling services available in NRW.

initialStep.title: Report an Incident
initialStep.description: Here, you can access the reporting form to report something queer-hostile.

description.firstParagraph: Thank you for taking the time and energy to report a queer-hostile incident.
description.secondParagraph: This form contains a total of 10 questions:
description.thirdParagraph: The first section is about the incident itself, asking what happened and how to categorize the incident. The second section is about the affected person. With this information, you help us list queer-hostile attacks more accurately in our statistics.
description.fourthParagraph: When you're finished, submit the form, and we will show you what counseling and information services are available.

options.name: identity
options.label: I'm reporting on behalf of the affected person
options.value: I'm reporting on behalf of the affected person

onBehalfHints.title: Hint
onBehalfHints.description: If you are filling out the reporting form on behalf of another person, it means that you are completing the form from the perspective of the affected individual and according to their self-disclosures. If this is not the case, and you wish to report an incident from your perspective as a witness, please select the 'Another Person' option above.

thirdStep.title: Incident Description*
thirdStep.placeholder: Please describe the incident as precisely as possible.
thirdStep.disclaimer: For data protection reasons we ask you not to enter names of other persons here.
thirdStep.minCharacters: A minimum of 50 Characters is expected

hints.title: Possible Relevant Information
list: Who was the perpetrator of the attack?
What impact did the incident have on you (e.g., emotional, physical, social, or financial) ?

thirdStepOrganization.title: What type of organization/institution is affected?
thirdStepOrganization.subTitle: Multiple selections possible
thirdStepOrganization.minCharacters: A minimum of 4 Characters is expected

fourthStep.title: When did the incident occur ?*
fourthStep.description: Please select a date. If it occurred over an extended period, you can select that too.
fourthStep.happenedOverALongPeriod: It happened over a long period of time.

fourthStepOrganization.title: How many individuals are active in the organization/institution?
fourthStepOrganization.subTitle: Main or volunteer, or as freelance contributors

thirdOption.title: City district
thirdOption.name: stadtteil
thirdOption.minCharacters: A minimum of 4 Characters is expected

sixthStep.title: What did you believe the discrimination was based on ?
sixthStep.minCharacters: A minimum of 4 Characters is expected

seventhStep.title: What form of queerphobia do you think this is  ?
seventhStep.minCharacters: A minimum of 4 Characters is expected

eightStep.title: Is it another form of discrimination ?
eightStep.minCharacters: A minimum of 4 Characters is expected

ninethStep.title: Have you already taken other measures ?
ninethStep.minCharacters: A minimum of 3 Characters is expected

optionsYes.name: haveYouReportedYes
optionsYes.value: I reported the case to the police
optionsYes.label: I reported the case to the police

optionsYes.name: haveYouReportedYes
optionsYes.value: I reported the case to another reporting agency, specifically:
optionsYes.label: I reported the case to another reporting agency, specifically:

tenthStep.minCharacters: A minimum of 4 Characters is expected

firstBlock.title: What is your gender identity ?
firstBlock.titleOnBehalf: What is the gender identity of the affected person ?

secondBlock.title: What is your sexual and/or romantic orientation?
secondBlock.titleOnBehalf: What is the sexual and/or romantic orientation of the affected person ?

thirdBlock.title: How old are you?
thirdBlock.titleOnBehalf: How old is the affected person?

data.name: validation
data.label: I consent to sharing my information with the relevant reporting agencies in case of multiple discrimination, in an anonymized form (hyperlink to the list).
data.value: Ich willige ein, dass meine Eingaben im Falle von Mehrfachdiskriminierung anonymisiert mit den zuständigen Meldestellen (Hyperlink zu Auflistung) geteilt werden.

data.name: validation
data.label: I hereby confirm the accuracy of my information, acknowledge the data protection regulations (hyperlink to data protection concept), and consent to the described processing of my personal data.*
data.value: Hiermit bestätige ich die Richtigkeit meiner Angaben, die Kenntnisnahme der Datenschutzbestimmungen (Hyperlink Datenschutzkonzept) und dass ich den darin beschriebenen Verarbeitungen meiner personenbezogenen Daten zustimme.*

eleventhStep.title: Thank you for your report.
eleventhStep.verification: Are you okay with this data ?
eleventhStep.description: You can access our page with links to counseling here.
